body_html:
Sorry about the close and reopen, my touch-pad malfunctioned.

@apaszke Following your suggestions, I have generalized the code to take only Variable as input. I have not added any asserts for that however.

Regarding the mean carrier measure, existing literature so far suggests that it is either 0 or intractable to compute. Maybe @fritzo and @alicanb can weigh in on this.
